muclient.script:
dim jfwobject dim speak 'do we want to speak?
sub toggleSpeaking (name, line, wc) if speak = 1 then speak = 0 jfwobject.Speak "sapi auto speak off.", 1 else speak = 1 jfwobject.Speak "sapi auto speak on.",1 end if end sub
sub OnPluginInstall set jfwobject = CreateObject("SAPI.SpVoice") jfwobject.Speak "sapi speaker is ready to rock!",1 speak = 1 end sub
sub OnPluginScreendraw (t, log, line) if (t = 0 or t = 1) and speak = 1 then jfwobject.Speak line, 1 end if end sub
sub OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if msg = 222 then jfwobject.Speak text,1 end if end sub
